remarks: Associative law for inner product.  Equation I2 of [Ponnusamy] p. 363. See ~ ipass , ~ his5 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphipcj.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
cphipcj.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cphass.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
cphass.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
cphass.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
cphass $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( ( A .x. B ) ., C ) = ( A x. ( B ., C ) ) ) $.
